title: #261:  You Can't Stop The Beat
description:
This episode is all about food! We talk about kitchen mind games on "Recipe for Deception," a beat-less brunch on "Real Housewives of Atlanta," crappy fish on "Top Chef," and a petty lunch on "Real Housewives of Potomac."

00:00:00 - Intro
00:07:16 - Crappens Mailbag
00:16:19 - Recipe for Deception
00:33:12 - Real Housewives of Atlanta
01:21:46 - Top Chef
01:41:39 - Real Housewives of Potomac

author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
